name: Dream League Soccer Asset File
summary: Learn about .FTC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You most likely will never come across a Dream League Soccer FTC file since it is an asset referenced by the game. However, if you want to alter gameplay, such as the jerseys, shoes, and stadium that appear in the game, you will need to modify the FTC files. These files can be found in the following directory of the game installation:
You can use a file manager, such as ES File Manager to navigate to the file location on your Android device.

description: An FTC file is an asset file created by Dream League Soccer, an Android soccer video game. It contains an asset, such as icon, sticker, or background that appears in the video game.
